name: Space Road (itch) (antijel, BlueSharx)
description:
Space Runner with interactions with elements inside the cockpit.

Solo VR Game where you'll have to maneuver between spaceships in a crowded road while keeping your own spaceship running by controlling its functionality inside the cockpit. You'll have to drive AND manage the different events happening at the same time without crashing. Your vehicule's speed will increase over time, and the events will become more and more difficult.

GO FULL SPEED

As a pilot you will cruise through a galaxy while being chased by the police. As times goes your spaceship will gain speed and you'll have to use your reflexes to dodge other pilots.

MANAGE YOUR SPACESHIP

Space is a dangerous place where you'll have to manage the different module in your cockpit to overcome any damage or events that could destroy your ship.

CONTROLS

All controls are based on VR interaction and grabbing objects in VR using the back trigger of the quest 2 controller. You will be able to grab the wheel and use the module directly in VR.

How far can you go without crashing or being caught ? 

TEAM

Clément MALLET - Project Manager/Developer

Kévin RIFA - UI Designer/Developer

FEEDBACK
